title: Phase 4 - Dashboard & Notifications

- SMS/email notifications

- [ ] UI accessible on mobile (responsive)

title: Phase 2 - LLM Orchestration
description:
AI-driven conversation with tool calling.

## Goals
- LLM orchestration with tool/function calling
- State machine-driven dialog
- Create/update call record
- Create callback task with summary
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] LLM provider interface defined with ABC
- [ ] OpenAI adapter implements tool calling
- [ ] State machine transitions: INIT→GREET→LANGUAGE_SELECT→CLASSIFY→INTENT→INFO→CONFIRM→CALLBACK→END
- [ ] All tool schemas validated with Pydantic (create_call_record, create_callback_task, etc.)
- [ ] Bilingual prompts for each state work correctly
- [ ] Callback task created with: name, number, intent, best time, summary
- [ ] Unit tests for state machine transitions (100% state coverage)
- [ ] Integration test: full conversation flow → callback task in DB
- [ ] Guardrails enforced: no SSN/DOB/payment collection

title: Implement call state machine
description:

## States
INIT → GREET → LANGUAGE_SELECT → CLASSIFY_CUSTOMER_TYPE → INTENT_DISCOVERY → INFO_COLLECTION → CONFIRMATION → CREATE_CALLBACK_TASK → TRANSFER_OR_WRAPUP → END

- [ ] Bilingual prompts per state
- [ ] 100% state transition test coverage
- [ ] Visualization: state diagram in docs/
